### Uninterrupted Power Supply (UPS) Device Replacement for Canada Border Services Agency

#### Invitation to Tender (RFP)
Shared Services Canada (SSC) is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the supply and delivery of Uninterrupted Power Supply (UPS) devices for the Canada Border Services Agency.

#### Project Overview
This project aims to meet the requirements of the Canada Border Services Agency (CBSA) for the replacement of UPS devices at various Ports of Entry (PoE) across Canada. The scope of work includes the supply, delivery, and installation of the UPS devices as well as all necessary accessories and components.

#### Tender Details
- **Tender Reference Number**: SSC-23-00022517:T
- **Amendment Number**: 2
- **Solicitation Number**: BPM018689/22517
- **Publication Date**: 2023-04-17
- **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-05-09T14:00:00

#### Key Requirements
- **Goods and Services**: Supply and delivery of UPS devices with all necessary accessories and components.
- **Scope of Work**: Installation of the UPS devices at various PoE locations across Canada.
- **Trade Agreements**: This tender is open to bidders who are registered under the following trade agreements: Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, and Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA).

#### Contact Information
- **Name**: Raiyane Benchekroun
- **Email**: [raiyanne.benchekroun@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:raiyanne.benchekroun@ssc-spc.gc.ca)
- **Phone**: 613 324 4061

#### Tender Documents
The tender documents, including the Request for Proposal (RFP) and relevant attachments, can be downloaded from the SSC Purchasing System (P2PSPC) website.
